languages.text: Пришло сообщение от отряда, возглавляемого опытной, флегматичной Седой Маттиной. Капитан методично доложила о всех секциях техотсека, которые успел осмотреть ее отряд. Ничего ценного не найдено. Тел экипажа не найдено. Происшествий не было, исследование идет в штатном режиме. Отряд ожидает дальнейших распоряжений Лорд-капитана.

A message came in from the unit led by the seasoned, unflappable Grey Mattina. The captain methodically reported on all the service bay sections her team had already examined. They had found nothing of value. They had found no bodies. There had been no incidents, and the search was proceeding as normal. The unit was waiting for further instructions from the Lord Captain.
languages.original_text: Пришло сообщение от отряда, возглавляемого опытной, флегматичной Седой Маттиной. Капитан методично доложила о всех секциях техотсека, которые успел осмотреть ее отряд. Ничего ценного не найдено. Тел экипажа не найдено. Происшествий не было, исследование идет в штатном режиме. Отряд ожидает дальнейших распоряжений Лорд-капитана.

A message came in from the unit led by the seasoned, unflappable Grey Mattina. The captain methodically reported on all the service bay sections her team had already examined. They had found nothing of value. They had found no bodies. There had been no incidents, and the search was proceeding as normal. The unit was waiting for further instructions from the Lord Captain.

languages.text: Llegó un mensaje de la unidad liderada por la avezada e imperturbable Mattina la Gris. La capitana informó metódicamente sobre las secciones de la bahía de servicio que su equipo había examinado ya. No habían encontrado nada de valor. Tampoco habían encontrado cadáveres. No se habían producido incidencias y la exploración continuaba con normalidad. La unidad esperaba instrucciones de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}.
languages.original_text: A message came in from the unit led by the seasoned, unflappable Grey Mattina. The captain methodically reported on all the service bay sections her team had already examined. They had found nothing of value. They had found no bodies. There had been no incidents, and the search was proceeding as normal. The unit was waiting for further instructions from the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: Llegó un mensaje de la unidad liderada por la avezada e imperturbable Mattina la Gris. La capitana informó metódicamente sobre las secciones de la bahía de servicio que su equipo había examinado ya. No habían encontrado nada de valor. Tampoco habían encontrado cadáveres. No se habían producido incidencias y la exploración continuaba con normalidad. La unidad esperaba instrucciones de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}.

languages.text: 经验丰富、沉着冷静的“灰马”上尉发来了消息。她有条不紊地报告说，她和她的队员们已经检查过维修区域的所有舱室，但并没有发现任何有价值的东西。目前没有发现尸体，也没有发生任何意外，搜索工作正在有序进行。这支小队正在等待舰长大人的进一步指示。
languages.original_text: A message came in from the unit led by the seasoned, unflappable Grey Mattina. The captain methodically reported on all the service bay sections her team had already examined. They had found nothing of value. They had found no bodies. There had been no incidents, and the search was proceeding as normal. The unit was waiting for further instructions from the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: 经验丰富、沉着冷静的“灰马”上尉发来了消息。她有条不紊地报告说，她和她的队员们已经检查过维修区域的所有舱室，但并没有发现任何有价值的东西。目前没有发现尸体，也没有发生任何意外，搜索工作正在有序进行。这支小队正在等待舰长大人的进一步指示。

languages.text: 百戦錬磨で動揺とは無縁のグレイ・マティナ率いる部隊からメッセージが届いた。中隊長は、チームがすでに調査したすべてのサービスベイのエリアについてまとめて報告した。何も価値のあるものを見つけられなかったようだ。死者も出ておらず、事故もなく、調査は通常通り行われた。部隊はロード・キャプテンから更なる指示を待っている。
languages.original_text: A message came in from the unit led by the seasoned, unflappable Grey Mattina. The captain methodically reported on all the service bay sections her team had already examined. They had found nothing of value. They had found no bodies. There had been no incidents, and the search was proceeding as normal. The unit was waiting for further instructions from the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: 百戦錬磨で動揺とは無縁のグレイ・マティナ率いる部隊からメッセージが届いた。中隊長は、チームがすでに調査したすべてのサービスベイのエリアについてまとめて報告した。何も価値のあるものを見つけられなかったようだ。死者も出ておらず、事故もなく、調査は通常通り行われた。部隊はロード・キャプテンから更なる指示を待っている。

languages.text: Eine Nachricht von der Einheit unter der Leitung der erfahrenen, unerschütterlichen Grauen Mattina traf ein. Der Captain berichtete methodisch von allen Abschnitten der Wartungsbucht, die ihr Team bereits untersucht hatte. Sie hatten nichts Wertvolles gefunden. Sie hatten keine Leichen gefunden. Es hatte keine Vorfälle gegeben, und die Suche verlief völlig normal. Die Einheit wartete auf weitere Anweisungen durch den Lord Captain.
languages.original_text: A message came in from the unit led by the seasoned, unflappable Grey Mattina. The captain methodically reported on all the service bay sections her team had already examined. They had found nothing of value. They had found no bodies. There had been no incidents, and the search was proceeding as normal. The unit was waiting for further instructions from the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: Eine Nachricht von der Einheit unter der Leitung der erfahrenen, unerschütterlichen Grauen Mattina traf ein. Der Captain berichtete methodisch von allen Abschnitten der Wartungsbucht, die ihr Team bereits untersucht hatte. Sie hatten nichts Wertvolles gefunden. Sie hatten keine Leichen gefunden. Es hatte keine Vorfälle gegeben, und die Suche verlief völlig normal. Die Einheit wartete auf weitere Anweisungen durch den Lord Captain.

languages.text: L'imperturbable et chevronnée Mattina la Grise contacta le groupe pour faire un rapport méthodique sur toutes les sections de l'aire de service que son unité avait déjà inspectées. Ils n'avaient rien trouvé d'utile, pas même le moindre cadavre, mais ils avaient mené leurs recherches sans encombre et attendaient maintenant que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} leur donne de nouvelles instructions.
languages.original_text: A message came in from the unit led by the seasoned, unflappable Grey Mattina. The captain methodically reported on all the service bay sections her team had already examined. They had found nothing of value. They had found no bodies. There had been no incidents, and the search was proceeding as normal. The unit was waiting for further instructions from the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: L'imperturbable et chevronnée Mattina la Grise contacta le groupe pour faire un rapport méthodique sur toutes les sections de l'aire de service que son unité avait déjà inspectées. Ils n'avaient rien trouvé d'utile, pas même le moindre cadavre, mais ils avaient mené leurs recherches sans encombre et attendaient maintenant que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} leur donne de nouvelles instructions.

languages.text: Kıdemli ve temkinli Gri Mattina'nın biriminden bir mesaj geldi. Yüzbaşı, takımının hâlihazırda incelediği tüm hizmet bölmeleri hakkında etraflıca rapor veriyordu. Kayda değer hiçbir şey bulamamışlardı. Naaşa da rastlamamışlardı. Olağan dışı bir durum söz konusu değildi ve keşif normal ilerliyordu. Birim, Lord Kaptan'ın yeni emirlerini bekliyordu.
languages.original_text: A message came in from the unit led by the seasoned, unflappable Grey Mattina. The captain methodically reported on all the service bay sections her team had already examined. They had found nothing of value. They had found no bodies. There had been no incidents, and the search was proceeding as normal. The unit was waiting for further instructions from the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: Kıdemli ve temkinli Gri Mattina'nın biriminden bir mesaj geldi. Yüzbaşı, takımı tarafından hâlihazırda incelenen tüm hizmet bölmeleri hakkında etraflıca rapor veriyordu. Kayda değer herhangi bir şey bulamamışlardı. Herhangi bir naaşa da rastlamamışlardı. Olağan dışı bir durum söz konusu değildi ve keşif normal ilerliyordu. Birim, Lord Kaptan'ın yeni emirlerini bekliyordu.
